title: Cuisinart Single Serve Brewer (SS-5)
description:
This K-Cup-compatible coffeemaker features a 40-oz. water reservoir, and allows users to choose from among 6, 8 or 10 oz. serving-size options to brew a cup of coffee or tea in seconds. The removable drip tray is designed to accommodate travel mugs, and the 30-minute auto shutoff gives busy consumers one less thing to worry about every morning. 

See more at: http://www.cuisinart.com/products/coffee_makers/ss-5.html
